snippet: Readers criticize a county clerk for letting her personal religious beliefs guide her government work.
lead_paragraph: Readers criticize a county clerk for letting her personal religious beliefs guide her government work.

headline.print_headline: The Clerk Who Denied Marriage Licenses to Gays
headline.main: The Kentucky Clerk Who Denied Marriage Licenses to Gay Couples
